TopicTitle: Launcher Won't let me hit Play (0.25)

Articles.Content:
I have just recently downloaded version 0.25, and when I launch the Launcher the Play button is grayed out. I had played version 0.24, and I couldn't update from the launcher or the Patcher. I ended up just downloading it off the website. I extracted the files into a folder in Program Files on my hard drive. I can play the game but it requires that I go into program files and launch the program. I can't use the launcher, which I have put on my desktop.

Thank you,

Cjgunnar

Edited October 16, 2014 by cjgunnar
Issue Solved

Try copying and pasting (not moving) the entire game to a new location outside of Program Files, such as C:\Games\. There are permissions issues when installing the game to protected folders like Program Files and Windows. You can delete the old copy after pasting it in the new location and testing it.

Also, welcome to the forums!
